ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Prototype
ResearchProjectDef.description: Required to unlock the Prototype Quantum Cooler. Could it really be possible?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Cooling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Required to unlock the Quantum Cooler. Research Quantum Mechanics in hopes of finding a way to reduce entropy without displacing it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Heating
ResearchProjectDef.description: Required to unlock the Quantum Heater. Research Quantum Mechanics in hopes of finding a more compact heating element.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum Generators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Required to unlock the Quantum Cooling and Heating Generator. Further expand your knowledge of Quantum Mechanics in hopes of combining entropy displacement with power generation.
